name: Liga Polska
overview: Liga Polska is a football management game. The game allows the player to select a team of the First Polish League and one of a dozen available coaches. The player as a manager decides on sponsors, footballers transfers, composition of the team, planning tactics for each match and intensity of training. The game features basic match statistics and league table. The match is presented by short comments on the most important actions. The club's finances consist of revenues from tickets, transfers, advertising and expenditure on salaries and taxes.
